roleset.name: be sure of
roleset.note: CERTAIN-J NOTES: Based on Thyme and Sharp data. Loose comparison to ascertain-v.01. Framed by Katie. (from certain.01-j)

example.name: certain-j
example.text: I have suggested a CT of the chest, liver, and adrenals PRO to be certain that this is, in fact, a primary tumor.
example.arg: that this is, in fact, a primary tumor.
